author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 10
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10

segments.pli: 21. Karajakāyavagga
segments.en: 21. The Body Born of Deeds

segments.pli: 218. Dutiyasañcetanikasutta
segments.en: 218. Intentional (2nd)

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi,
segments.en: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.

segments.pli: tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye.
segments.en: And that may be in the present life, or in the next life, or in some subsequent period.

segments.pli: Na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
segments.en: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.

segments.pli: Tatra, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti;
segments.en: Now, there are three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti;
segments.en: There are four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: There are three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action.

segments.pli: Tividhakāyakammantasandosabyāpattiakusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti, catubbidhavacīkammanta … pe … tividhamanokammantasandosabyāpattiakusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
segments.en: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi,
segments.en: I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.

segments.pli: tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye.
segments.en: And that may be in the present life, or in the next life, or in some subsequent period.

segments.pli: Na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
segments.en: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.

segments.pli: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti;
segments.en: Now, there are three kinds of successful bodily action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti;
segments.en: There are four kinds of successful verbal action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: There are three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the three kinds of successful bodily action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the three kinds of successful bodily action.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the four kinds of successful verbal action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the four kinds of successful verbal action.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And what are the three kinds of successful mental action? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.
segments.en: These are the three kinds of successful mental action.

segments.pli: Tividhakāyakammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasampatti … pe … tividhamanokammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti … pe …
segments.en: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these three kinds of successful bodily action, these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result. …”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.

sections.title: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have…

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha asserts that one’s kamma must be exhausted before making an end of suffering. This statement precedes a long explanation of deeds and their causes.
